full-name.required: You must enter your full name
full-name.maxlength: You can't use more than {{maxlength}} characters for your answer

your-email-options.required: Tell us if the referrer has an email address

your-email-address.maxlength: Email address must be between 6 and 254 characters

parent-full-name.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/url into your answers

parent-date-of-birth.required: Enter this parent's date of birth

parent-date-of-birth.over18: Parent must be over 18. Parents that are under 18 cannot be referred.

parent-country.required: Enter the country this parent lives in
parent-country.isInCountriesList: You must choose a country from the provided list

provide-telephone-number-number.maxlength: Telephone number must be between 8 and 16 characters
